title: The story of GARP: A potential target for cancer immunotherapy

title_detail.value: The story of GARP: A potential target for cancer immunotherapy

summary: Researchers reveal how the cell surface receptor GARP plays a role in T regulatory cell function and migration to the gut. Because the presence of T regulatory cells in the gut is generally associated with negative outcomes in patients with colorectal cancer, GARP could have potential as a therapeutic target for patients with this type of cancer.
